summary: Mobile-friendly solar panel business management app with customer management, document uploads, task assignment with deadlines and priorities, project status tracking through 8 stages, solar system details (DCR/Non-DCR, kW size, panel company), global search, dashboard analytics, and activity timeline
architectural_notes: Backend built with Motoko on Internet Computer
8-stage project workflow: Files Uploaded → Bank → Loan Passed → Feasibility → Product Arrived → Installation Completed → KSEB Registration → MNRE Form
Solar system tracking: panel type (DCR/Non-DCR), kW size, panel company
Global search by customer name, phone, panel company, kW size
Activity timeline auto-records status changes with timestamps
Dashboard analytics: total customers, completed installations, pending KSEB/MNRE, total kW

existing_features.title: Implement automatic deadline reminder notifications that trigger before task deadlines to prevent delays
Add offline support with service worker for offline viewing and automatic syncing when internet is restored
Build document upload UI with file picker and upload progress indicators for customer document management
Implement advanced dashboard filtering by panel company, kW size, and project stage to help with task planning
Polish UI with responsive design improvements and loading states throughout the application
